title: antsMotionCorr
description: ANTS Motion Correction application to perform motion correction on 4D time series data.

output_transform_prefix.title: Output transform prefix
output_transform_prefix.description: The output is the transformation matrix.

warped_image.title: Warped Image
warped_image.description: The output is the warped moving image.

average_image_output.title: Average Image Output
average_image_output.description: The output is the averaged image of the input time series.
